conditions.description: List of conditions, each condition containing condition clusters, condition parameters, asset IDs, scope, and consent details.

label.description: A human readable name of the vocabulary/ontology condition term, such as ‘Disease specific research’.

uri.description: A URI to the vocabulary/ontology term, such as DUO URI: ‘http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/DUO_0000007’.

ornaments.description: One or more concepts that specify the details of this condition in the conditionCluster.

label.description: Optional human readable ornament detail that applies to this condition.

uri.description: Optional vocabulary/ontology concept URI related to the ornament detail that applies to this condition.

rule.description: The direction to interpret this condition term.

label.description: Optional human readable parameter detail that applies to the entire conditionCluster.

uri.description: Optional vocabulary/ontology concept URI related to the parameter label that applies to the entire conditionCluster.

value.description: Optional value for the parameter if any.

assetsIdList.description: The list of assed IDs corresponding to the list of assets in 'assets' array.

scope.description: A scope to state if this condition applies to all assets or some of assets.Whole of asset should be the default.

consent.description: Optional consent status and response as it relates to the list of assetIdList and conditionCluster.

assets.description: Optional list of assets that this DUC profile's conditions relate to.

assetReferences.description: Optional list of web links to external documents describing the asset(s) this profile applies to, such as publications.

assetURI.description: Optional URI for the asset catalogue-level object (for example a DCAT object).

profileId.description: Optional URI with unique identifier of this DUC profile (e.g., https://domain/UUID).

profileVersion.description: Optional semantic version of this DUC profile (e.g., 0.0.1).

profileName.description: Optional name of this DUC profile.

ducVersion.description: Optional semantic version of the DUC schema (e.g., 2.0.0).

creationDate.description: Optional date this DUC profile was first created in ISO 8601 format.

lastUpdated.description: Optional date this DUC profile was most recently updated in ISO 8601 format.

permissionMode.description: Optional default interpretation for all unstated conditions.

language.description: Optional ISO 639-3 letter code for the language used in this DUC profile.
